channel.title: Comments on: Finding Meaning and Purpose Can Help You Deal with Distress, No Matter How Extreme.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Jeff Vankooten
item.dc:creator: Jeff Vankooten
item.description:
I heard once that meaninglessness comes not from having too much pain, but too much pleasure. No one has grown outside of adversity. Tough to accept but true. Those with a lot of "scar tissue"- healed wounds of pain, are the ones with the wisdom I seek. Thank you for the reminder and encouragement to seek after meaning. It digs our pylons deep in the soil of life.
jeffvankooten.com
item.content:encoded:
I heard once that meaninglessness comes not from having too much pain, but too much pleasure. No one has grown outside of adversity. Tough to accept but true. Those with a lot of “scar tissue”- healed wounds of pain, are the ones with the wisdom I seek. Thank you for the reminder and encouragement to seek after meaning. It digs our pylons deep in the soil of life.
